item.title: Linux Is Best
item.description:
@estelle4565@masto.nu @thenexusofprivacy@infosec.exchange

That actually happens everytime we have a new President and it was not forced.

POTUS, short for, President of the United States, is the Presidental Account. It automatically gets assigned to whoever is President. If you followed, the POTUS account when it was Joe Biden, it simply converted to Donald Trump.

Facebook.com/POTUS is always whoever is President.

item.title: Qasim Rashid, Esq.
item.description:
Letâ€™s be clear. Trump did not repel the EEOC. An executive order cannot repeal legislation. Trump revoked President Johnsonâ€™s Executive Order 11246, which protected affirmative action for federal contractors. Trumpâ€™s EO does not impact Title VII or laws enforced by the EEOC.
He may try to do so via legislation. But this is not that.

item.title: SellaTheChemist
item.description: Had a long chat with one of my personal tutees (students for whom I have pastoral care). Very smart, articulate, and funny young woman who is ASD and has a modest physical disability. She told me about an automated interview where the AI gave her some kind of feedback at the end. Apparently it "concluded" that she is not a team player and is anti-social. This could not be more wrong. I wonder whether she will get a rejection tomorrowâ€¦Â  I'm pretty outraged. #AI #bias #risk #disability

item.title: Spencer LaVere Smith
item.description:
Mencken said that truly civilized people are "skeptical and tolerant".Rigor and compassion are often lacking in popular political discussions. The one thing that is needed even more urgently is leadership. Another Mencken quote: "It doesnâ€™t take a majority to make a rebellion; it takes only a few determined leaders and a sound cause."
http://labrigger.com/blog/2025/01/22/5466/

item.title: Matt Blaze
item.description: That the new administration is opposed to "DEI" (and is quick to use it as a scapegoat for just about everything bad) is unsurprising and was expected, but the aggressiveness of today's anti-DEI purge is still jarring and disturbing. They are creating an atmosphere in which any attempt to hire, promote, or engage with anyone other than a white male will be regarded as inherently suspect.The damage - to both individuals and to our institutions - will likely be both swift and long lasting.

item.title: Gabriele Svelto
item.description: The whole "Roman salute" thing needs some clarification. There's no such thing as a "Roman salute". It was made up by fascists in Italy and then copied by the nazi regime. Only fascists use it. End of story.https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Roman_salute

item.title: Mark Humphries
item.description:
Save the date!

UK Neural Computation 2025 will be at Imperial College London
9 July: ECR day
10-11 July: main meeting

9 invited speakers, 4 talks from abstracts and many posters

Abstract & registration opening soon

Pls share!

https://neuralcomputation.ukImperial College organisers: Danyal Akarca & @neuralreckoning
